ASSISTANT_DESCRIPTION_NONUS_IPAD: Siri helps you get things done just by asking. You can send a message, dictate a note, or check the weather.
ASSISTANT_DESCRIPTION_IPAD: Siri helps you get things done just by asking. You can send a message, dictate a note, or even find a restaurant.
WHAT_IS_SIRI_DESCRIPTION_IPOD:
Siri lets you use your voice to interact with and use many features of your iPod touch.

Siri understands what you’re saying and also what you mean, so you can speak naturally when you ask it to help you do something. It also knows enough about you — your location, contacts, and contact relationships — to provide intelligent, personal assistance.

You can ask Siri to:
ASSISTANT_DESCRIPTION_IPHONE: Siri helps you get things done just by asking. You can make a phone call, send a message, dictate a note, or even find a restaurant.
WHAT_IS_SIRI_DESCRIPTION_IPAD:
Siri lets you use your voice to interact with and use many features of your iPad.

Siri understands what you’re saying and also what you mean, so you can speak naturally when you ask it to help you do something. It also knows enough about you — your location, contacts, and contact relationships — to provide intelligent, personal assistance.

You can ask Siri to:
ASSISTANT_DESCRIPTION_IPOD: Siri helps you get things done just by asking. You can send a message, dictate a note, or even find a restaurant.
WHAT_IS_SIRI_DESCRIPTION_IPHONE:
Siri lets you use your voice to interact with and use many features of your iPhone.

Siri understands what you’re saying and also what you mean, so you can speak naturally when you ask it to help you do something. It also knows enough about you — your location, contacts, and contact relationships — to provide intelligent, personal assistance.

You can ask Siri to:
WHAT_IS_SIRI_MESSAGES: Send and respond to messages and email
WHAT_IS_SIRI_DIRECTIONS: Find a local business with directions
ASSISTANT_DESCRIPTION_NONUS_IPOD: Siri helps you get things done just by asking. You can send a message, dictate a note, or check the weather.
ASSISTANT_DESCRIPTION_NONUS_IPHONE: Siri helps you get things done just by asking. You can make a phone call, send a message, dictate a note, or check the weather.
ASSISTANT_FINE_PRINT: Siri sends information like your voice input, contacts, and location to Apple to process your requests.
